Rock Throwing: R20' Thrown rock +1 attack inflicts 2d4+0 HP

Steelbreaker Skin: Skin inflicts 20 HP on striking weapon, ignoring 10 points of hardness, for 20 min 1/dy
Stone Stability: +4 CMD vs. bull rush and trip while standing on ground
Strike Back: Ready melee attack against any foe that attacks you
Touch Of Acid: Touch inflicts 1d6+10 HP acid 6/dy; wielded weapons inflict +1d6 HP acid

Magic
Spell Slots: O0: 9; O1: 7; O2: 7; O3: 7; O4: 6; O5: 6; O6: 6; O7: 6; O8: 6; O9: 6 Spell DC: O: 13
Spells:
Clashing Rocks (O9 Conj): R1200' Ranged touch inflicts 20d6 HP bludgeoning, knocked prone, and buried in rubble (DC 22 Ref not buried); missed target and creatures in path suffer 10d6 HP and knocked prone (DC 22 Ref half HP only)
Magic Stone (O1 Tran): 3 touched stones attack at +1 and inflict 1d6+1 HP (2d6+2 HP vs. undead) for 30 min
Meld Into Stone (O3 Tran): Self passes into stone for 200 min
Repel Metal Or Stone (O8 Abju): Repels 60' line of unanchored metal or stone for 20 rd
Statue (O7 Tran): Touched becomes statue at will for 20 hr
Stone Call (O2 Conj): R300' 40' radius inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning for 1 rd, then difficult terrain for 19 rd
Stone Tell (O6 Divi): Self speaks w/stone for 20 min
Stoneskin (O5 Abju): Touched gains DR 10/adamantine for 150 HP or 200 min
Wall Of Stone (O5 Conj): R300' Creates 20 5' x 5 inch thick permanent stone wall
Magic Notes:
Charisma Oracle Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level O1, O2, O3
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Clobbering Strike: May make swift action trip attempt w/out provoking AOO after crit w/attack spell
Elemental Spell (Cold): May convert half or all spell damage to cold damage; uses +1 spell slot
Empower Spell: x1.5 chosen spell variable effects uses +2 spell slot
Final Revelation (Stone Mystery): May apply Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Silent Spell, or Still Spell to acid and earth spells w/out cost
Maximize Spell: Maximize all chosen spell variable effects uses +3 spell slot
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Persistent Spell: May force spell target to take worse of 2 saving throws; uses +2 spell slot
Quicken Spell: Free action casting 1/rd uses +4 spell slot
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Silent Spell: Cast spell w/out speech uses +1 spell slot
